document_data.name: Morgenthel
document_data.mainbody: '''Morgenthel''' was a [[wizard]] and [[bounty hunter]] hired by the [[lich]] [[Szass Tam]] in [[1394 DR]] to find [[Seren Juramot]], who fled [[Thay]] with the treasure of the Thayan enclave in [[Ravens Bluff]].
